long_description: A high-quality ABS kayak designed for larger paddlers, the Eddyline Denali Kayak with Skeg offers a sleek profile for long tours with abundant foot and leg room for extra comfort. Co-extruded ABS laminate creates a hull that offers the looks and performance of a composite kayak with the durability of plastic; exterior is abrasion- and UV-resistant. Fully adjustable seat and backrest provide support and comfort; contoured thighbraces ensure a comfortable paddling position. Drop-down skeg allows for straight tracking; adjust its position to allow for crosswinds, current, or wave direction. Bulkheads and hatches, perimeter lines, deck bungees and retractable carry handles complete the package. The Eddyline Denali Kayak with Skeg weighs 50 lbs.
short_description: A high-quality ABS kayak designed for larger paddlers, the Eddyline Denali Kayak with Skeg offers a sleek profile for long tours with abundant foot and leg room for extra comfort.
